class Foo {
    constructor() {
        this.values = [10, 20, 30]
    }
    // \u81EA\u5B9A\u4E49\u8FED\u4EE3\u5668
    * [Symbol.iterator]() {
        yield* this.values
    }
}

const f = new Foo()
for (const x of f) {
    console.log(x)
}
// 10
// 20
// 30

console.log(dest);				//{id:src}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Person (name){
	this.name = name;
	this.sayName = function(){
		console.log(this.name)
	}
	// \u7B49\u4EF7\u4E8E\uFF0C \u6BCF\u6B21\u90FD\u521B\u5EFA\u65B0\u7684\u51FD\u6570\u5B9E\u4F8B\uFF0C \u6CA1\u5FC5\u8981
	// this.sayName = new Function("console.log(this.name)")

	// \u53EF\u4EE5\u6539\u6210
	// this.sayName = sayName
}

function sayName (){
	console.log(this.name)
}

let person1 = new Person("hi");
let person2 = new Person("hi2");

console.log(person1.sayName === person2.sayName ) // false

console.log(person1.constructor === Person) // true
console.log(person1 instanceof Person) // true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function Person (){}

PersonPrototype = {
	name: "hi",
	sayName: function(){
		console.log(this.name)
	}
} Huang@0369haiwen
Person.prototype = PersonPrototype
// Person

let person1 = new Person("hi");
let person2 = new Person("hi2");

console.log(person1.sayName === person2.sayName ) // true

console.log(Person.prototype.__proto__ === Object.prototype) 		//true
console.log(Person.prototype.__proto__.constructor === Object) 		//true
console.log(Person.prototype.__proto__.__proto__ === null) 		       //true

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`
function SuperType(name){ 
 this.name = name; 
 this.colors = ["red", "blue", "green"]; 
} 
SuperType.prototype.sayName = function() { 
 console.log(this.name); 
}; 
function SubType(name, age){ 
 // \u7EE7\u627F\u5C5E\u6027
 SuperType.call(this, name); 
 this.age = age; 
} 
// \u7EE7\u627F\u65B9\u6CD5
SubType.prototype = new SuperType();

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"js","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`function object(o) {
  function F() {}
  F.prototype = o;
  return new F();
}

function createAnother(original) {
  let clone = object(original); // \u901A\u8FC7\u8C03\u7528\u51FD\u6570\u521B\u5EFA\u4E00\u4E2A\u65B0\u5BF9\u8C61
  clone.sayHi = function () { // \u4EE5\u67D0\u79CD\u65B9\u5F0F\u589E\u5F3A\u8FD9\u4E2A\u5BF9\u8C61
    console.log("hi");
  };
  return clone; // \u8FD4\u56DE\u8FD9\u4E2A\u5BF9\u8C61
}

let person = {
  name: "Nicholas",
  friends: ["Shelby", "Court", "Van"]
};
let anotherPerson = createAnother(person);
anotherPerson.sayHi(); // "hi"

	//ES6\u4E4B\u540E========================
	//\u5B9A\u4E49\u4E00\u4E2A\u5B66\u751F\u7684\u7C7B
	class Student{
		constructor(name){
			this.name = name;
		}
		hello(){
			alert('hello');
		}
}

	class XiaoStudent extends Student{
		constructor(name,grade){
			super(name);
			this.grade = grade;
		}
		myGrade(){
			alert('\u6211\u662F\u4E00\u540D\u5C0F\u5B66\u751F');
		}
	}

	var xiaoming = new Student("xiaoming");
	var xiaohong = new XiaoStudent("xiaohong",1);
<\/script>
